Trigger.name: combatstats.getdamage
Trigger.script:
if not damage then damage = 0 end
if tonumber(matches[2]) == 0 then return end
damage = damage + matches[2] if avdammute == false then cecho("<dodger_blue>Damage captured") end

Trigger.name: combatstats.gethit.given
Trigger.script: if not hitsgiven then hitsgiven = 0 end if not attacks then attacks = 0 end hitsgiven = hitsgiven + 1 attacks = attacks + 1 if avdammute == false then cecho("<dodger_blue>hitsgiven recorded") end

Trigger.name: combatstats.getmiss
Trigger.script: if not misses then misses = 0 end if not attacks then attacks = 0 end misses = misses + 1 attacks = attacks + 1 if avdammute == false then cecho("<dodger_blue>misses recorded.") end

Trigger.name: combatstats.getdodge
Trigger.script: if not dodges then dodges = 0 end dodges = dodges + 1 if avdammute == false then cecho("<dodger_blue>dodges recorded") end

Trigger.name: combatstats.gethit.taken
Trigger.script: if not hitstaken then hitstaken = 0 end hitstaken = hitstaken + 1 if avdammute == false then cecho("<dodger_blue>hitstaken recorded") end

Alias.name: combatstats clear
Alias.script: damage = 0 hitsgiven = 0 hitstaken = 0 dodges = 0 misses = 0 attacks = 0 cecho("\n<dodger_blue>Combatstats cleared")

Alias.name: combatstats print
Alias.script:
if not damage then damage = 0 end if not attacks then attacks = 0 end if not hitsgiven then hitsgiven = 0 end if not misses then misses = 0 end if not hitstaken then hitstaken = 0 end if not dodges then dodges = 0 end
cecho("

<sienna>Raw data:") cecho("
<GreenYellow>Damage = " .. damage) cecho("
<GreenYellow>Attacks = " .. attacks) cecho("
<GreenYellow>Hits given = " .. hitsgiven) cecho("
<GreenYellow>Misses = " .. misses) cecho("
<GreenYellow>Hits taken = " .. hitstaken) cecho("
<GreenYellow>Dodges = " .. dodges)
if attacks == 0 then cecho("

<dodger_blue>Average damage = 0") else cecho("

<dodger_blue>Average damage = " .. damage/attacks) end
if attacks == 0 then cecho("
<dodger_blue>Accuracy = 0") else accuracy = hitsgiven/attacks*100 cecho("
<dodger_blue>Accuracy = " .. string.format("<dodger_blue> %.2f", accuracy) .. "%") end
if dodges == 0 then cecho("
<dodger_blue>Dodge rate = 0") else enemytotalattacks = hitstaken + dodges dodgerate = dodges/enemytotalattacks*100 cecho("
<dodger_blue>Dodge rate = " .. string.format("<dodger_blue> %.2f", dodgerate) .. "%") end

Alias.name: combatstats help
Alias.script:
cecho("
<dodger_blue>Combatstats, A simple tool to help calculate average damage and accuracy of a fight.
") cecho("
<dodger_blue>combatstats help - Display this helpfile.") cecho("
<dodger_blue>combatstats clear - Clear collected data.") cecho("
<dodger_blue>combatstats print - Print collected data") cecho("
<dodger_blue>combatstats mute - Mute the 'damage grabbed' and 'hit recorded' messages.")

Alias.name: combatstats mute
Alias.script: if not avdammute then avdammute = false end if avdammute == false then avdammute = true cecho("\n<dodger_blue>Combatstats muted.") elseif avdammute == true then avdammute = false cecho("\n<dodger_blue>Combatstats unmuted.") end

Script.name: combatstats.startup
Script.script:
function combatstatsstartup() cecho("\n<dodger_blue>combatstatscalc loaded. 'combatstats help' for more info") end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysLoadEvent", "combatstatsstartup")
